GET InstanceRoot.summary: Retrieves the URLs for all other service calls for this IBE instance.
GET InstanceRoot.description: This API leverages HATEOAS as per the RESTful design pattern. This means that other than this initial query, all other URLs are provided in responses, including this one. No other URL should be coded to directly, as their locations might change.

GET StaticData.description: Retrieves all the language- and locale-independent static data any client might need to run this application.

GET StaticLanguageData.description: Retrieves all the language-specific static data any client might need to run this application in the given language.

header.name: Accept-Language
header.description: The language of the language-specific data to be returned.

header.name: Content-Language
header.description: The language of the language-specific data to be returned.

GET StaticLocaleData.description: Retrieves all the locale-specific static data any client might need to run this application in the given locale.

header.name: Accept-Locale
header.description: The locale for the locale-specific data to be returned.

header.name: Content-Locale
header.description: The locale of the locale-specific data to be returned.

POST Availability.description: This endpoint provides all the items available at a Site(Hotel)

response.name: Conflict
response.description: The reservation request was processed, but unable to be created.

GET MapImage.summary: Retrieve an image of a street map.
GET MapImage.description: Generates and returns an image of a street map to a hotel or destination.

query.name: w
query.description: The width of the desired image.

query.name: h
query.description: The height of the desired image.
